readable.title: 3716277216_c04002be81
readable.content: Three african american women are dressed in bright orange and brown dresses and head scarves . three African women in traditional orange costume are gathered in front of a yellow curtain . Three women are dressed in African clothes , and two of them are putting on make-up . Three women wearing traditional apparel make the final touches on their clothing . Women are putting their robes and headdresses on .
